casebody.data:
STATE
v.
Shellman HUGHES. No. 512P08. Supreme Court of North Carolina. February 5, 2009. Derrick C. Mertz, Charles E. Reece, Assistant Attorney Generals, Ben David, District Attorney, for State of NC.

The following order has been entered on the motion filed on the 12th day of November *8682008 by Defendant for "Petition for Discretionary Review Under G.S. 7A-31":

"Motion Denied by order of the Court in conference this the 5th day of February 2009."
